actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 358. Upon the adoption of the resolution, it shall be in order to consider the conference report, and all points of order against it and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered read when called up.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-947, by Mr. Moakley.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 212.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 186 - 235 (Roll No. 526).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report on the bill (S. 358) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change the level, and preference system for admission, of immigrants to the United States, and to provide for administrative naturalization, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 358 (immigration and aliens).

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report on the bill (S. 358) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change the level, and preference system for admission, of immigrants to the United States, and to provide for administrative naturalization, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.
